officialTitle: Efficacy of the Liposomal Bupivacaine for Postoperative Pain Control in Urologic Procedures
inclusionCriteria:
* Patients undergoing urologic surgery.
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Pregnant and/or nursing mothers.
* Allergy to bupivacaine.
* History of drug/alcohol abuse.
* Severe cardiovascular, hepatic, renal disease or neurological impairment.
